title: No doubt, this is good!
body:
My old coffee maker with grind & brew function gave up after 5 years of heavy use.

After research and many thoughts, I was deciding between two models/brands. I finally decided for Russel Hobbs Grind & Brew 25620-56 mainly for two reasons: it is a different brand I previously never opted for, in any of my household machines and the review on this machine of user ‚ÄúMiele‚Äù from 26th of April 2022. Now using the machine, I can say this review is spot on and I agree to every point, (except I bought a new unused one)

So here is just what I think additionally:
- I am sad not to have 2 bean chambers, I used to like making my own blend with 2 kinds of beans.
- The machine is way quieter than any brew & grinder I had before.
- The coffee is delicious, and I save about 40% beans because I only have to use 2 more cups of coffee than I fill in water, with my previous machine I needed double the cups of coffee in proportion to the water (I like my coffee really strong).
- I am forgetful and sometimes forget to add the filter paper into the filter holder. Although this is not the machine‚Äôs fault, it is a deadly mess with this machine. The coffee runs through very fast and spills all over the place. I am really happy, that the thermos place holder is closed and not like with all the previous machines with a little gap to the motor, so the spilled coffee really stays outside. Again: my fault, it‚Äôs just messier because it works so quickly and yet way better than all other machines because the inside of the machine stays dry. So if you are a clutz like me: take precautions.
- I really love the stainless-steel thermos. The edges inside are a bit sharp edged so you have to be a little bit careful cleaning it but it is very hygienic and perfect to handle.
- The functions and options are super easy, kept simple and self-explanatory. No rocket since needed to set the timer, switch between beans and powder etc.

Clever and comfortable machine, I really recommend this for delicious, perfect coffee and also for time saving in rushed mornings.
